20020610

org.eclipse.update and org.eclipse.update.ui are both contributing a Software 
Updates menu item. One is contributing an action the other a menu.
The action does not work.

org.eclipse.update is the R1.0 update manager support. It is not being included 
in 2.0 builds. There is no expectation of running the R1.0 and R2.0 support 
concurrently.
